snippet: Exports rose 12.7 percent in November compared with last year, far higher than expectations, and analysts say it could be more evidence the Chinese economy is recovering.
abstract: China's exports rose 12.7 percent in November compared with year-ago November, far higher than expectations, and analysts say it could be more evidence the Chinese economy is recovering; imports increased 5.3 percent.
lead_paragraph: Exports rose 12.7 percent in November compared with last year, far higher than expectations, and analysts say it could be more evidence the Chinese economy is recovering.

headline.main: Export Surge Sets Up Big Surplus for China
headline.print_headline: Export Surge Sets Up Big Surplus for China
